subject: Reminder: Your OUR SEARCH Account
body:
Dear student,

This is a reminder that you are still active on the OUR SEARCH app. If you would like to delete your profile or update your information, please log into your account.

If  you have any questions or require assistance, feel free to reach out to our team.

Kind regards,
The OUR SEARCH Team

subject: Reminder: Your OUR SEARCH Account
body:
Dear faculty,\nThis is a reminder that you are still active on the OUR SEARCH app. If you would like to delete your profile or updated your research postings, please log into your account.

If you have any questions or require assistance, don't hesitate to contact our team.

Kind regards,
The OUR SEARCH Team

subject: OUR Search: New postings this week!
body:
Dear OUR-SEARCH student,

You are receiving this email because you have shown interest in {interests} research.

This week, {number_of_postings} new projects from the {interests} majors were posted in OUR-SEARCH. The new projects are:

{new_postings}

Please {click_here} to go to the OUR-SEARCH app.

We encourage you to view these projects and reach out to the faculty you are interested in working with.

Let us know if you have any questions or concerns.

Kind regards,

subject: OUR-SEARCH: New students this week!
body:
Dear faculty,

{number_of_students} new students who might be interested in your research projects joined OUR-SEARCH this week. The students are:

{new_students}

Please {click_here} to open your dashboard.

Kind regards,
